question: 天気
sourceMnemonic: What is the <kanji>heaven</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji>? If you think about it, that's all the stuff that falls on us from the sky. Lightning, rain, snow, hail... What is all of that? It's the <vocabulary>weather</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
